organizations: Justin Timberlake Shriners Hospitals for Children Open
lead_paragraph: Marc Turnesa completed a wire-to-wire victory for his first PGA Tour title, closing with a four-under-par 68 to hold off Matt Kuchar by a stroke at the Justin Timberlake Shriners Hospitals for Children Open in Las Vegas. Turnesa became the eighth rookie to win on the tour this season.
